briefdescription.para: Last input stored in the estimator.
Current state stored in the estimator.
Lateral dimension of the robot foot.
Frontal dimension of the robot foot.
Define the 4 foot vertices in World reference frame:

detaileddescription.para: + m_p2 __|__ m_p1 __ | | | | ___|__|__|___+ | FOOT | | | | LENGTH |__|__| __| m_p3 | m_p4 |_____| FOOT WIDTH this implementation is considering rectangular feet (4 corners)

briefdescription.para: vector of the foot corners transformed into the inertial frame
the position vector extracted from the desiredFootPose
the rotation matrix extracted from the desiredFootPose
the rotation matrix extracted from the desiredFootPose converted into Euler angles
the measured foot orientation casted manif::SO3d --> Eigen::Matrix3d
the measured foot orientation converted into Euler angles
rotation matrix that employs: measured Roll, measured Pitch, desired Yaw
the final foot pose matrix obtained through measured and desired quantities
coordinate change matrix from foot link frame to foot sole frame
Index of the frame whose pose needs to be estimated.
reference frames of the possible stance feet (whose orientations are measured)
Set the iDynTree::Model of the robot to be used by the estimator.

parameterdescription.para: the model considered in the estimator

simplesect.para: true in case of success, false otherwise.

briefdescription.para: Initialize the BaseEstimatorFromFootIMU block.

detaileddescription.para:
The setModel and setStanceFootRF methods must be called before initialization.
handler
pointer to the parameter handler.
The following parameters are required
Parameter Name
Type
Description
Mandatory
foot_width_in_m
double
Transversal dimension of the robot foot
Yes
foot_length_in_m
double
Longitudinal dimension of the robot foot
Yes
Moreover the user needs to add a group named MODEL_INFO that contains the following parameters.
Parameter Name
Type
Description
Mandatory
base_frame
std::string
Name of the frame whose pose must be estimated
Yes
foot_frame
std::string
Name of the frame of one of the possible stance feet (whose orientation is measured)
Yes
true in case of success/false otherwise.

briefdescription.para: Set the input of the estimator.

simplesect.para: true in case of success, false otherwise.

briefdescription.para: Perform one step of the estimator.

detaileddescription.para:
The estimator must have been initialized first.
true in case of success, false otherwise.

briefdescription.para: Check if the output of the estimator is valid.

simplesect.para: true in case of success, false otherwise.

briefdescription.para: Get the internal state of the BaseEstimatorFromFootIMU.

simplesect.para: a const reference to the state of the estimator.

briefdescription.para: Set the state of the BaseEstimatorFromFootIMU.

simplesect.para: This method should be called only if the user want to force the state of the system.

briefdescription.para: BaseEstimatorFromFootIMU implements the propagation of the foot pose to the root link through the kinematic chain given by the leg joints positions.

detaileddescription.para:
This class assumes that the foot has a rectangular shape as shown in the following schematics
p2 __|__ p1 __ | | | | ___|__|__|___+ | FOOT | | | | LENGTH |__|__| __| p3 | p4
|_____| FOOT WIDTH
